document.full_text: two americans held in iran on spying charges for nearly two years will go on trial on wednesday, the state department said on tuesday, calling on tehran to quickly resolve the case.
document.title: iran to try u.s. hikers on wednesday, u.s. says
lines_and_colors: two americans held in iran on spying charges for nearly two years will go on trial on wednesday, the state department said on tuesday, calling on tehran to quickly resolve the case.
